pages.title: Preferences
pages.desc: Adjust aspects of gameplay to your liking.

pages.title: Appearance
pages.desc: Adjust the appearance of certain things such as the FPS Counter or Note Skins.

pages.title: Note Colors
pages.desc: Adjust the color of your notes to anything you like.

pages.title: Controls
pages.desc: Adjust your controls to be more comfortable. Includes presets to use!

settings.name: Downscroll
settings.desc: Makes your notes scroll downwards.

settings.name: Centered Notes
settings.desc: Makes your notes centered and hides the opponent's notes.

settings.name: Ghost Tapping
settings.desc: Allows you to press keys while there are no notes able to be hit.

settings.name: Botplay
settings.desc: Makes the game play itself.

settings.name: Miss Sounds
settings.desc: Plays a sound when missing a note.

settings.name: Anti Mash
settings.desc: Allows the player to get punished for getting a SHiT on a note.

settings.name: Developer Mode
settings.desc: Allows you to access the toolbox and allows you to reload scenes by pressing F5.

settings.name: Maximum Logs
settings.desc: Adjust how many logs can be shown. (Increasing this may impact for CPU!)

settings.name: Note Offset
settings.desc: Adjust how early or late notes spawn. (Negative = Earlier, Positive = Later)

settings.name: Scroll Speed
settings.desc: Adjust how fast your notes go. (0 = Chart Scroll Speed)

settings.name: Ultra Performance
settings.desc: Allows the game to run better on older/worse PCs by removing the characters and backgrounds.

settings.name: Antialiasing
settings.desc: Allows the game to run better at the cost of slightly worse looking graphics.

settings.name: Photosensitive Mode
settings.desc:
Disables content such as flashing lights or intense effects for players who are sensitive to them.
(Warning! This may not work on every mod!)

settings.name: Show FPS
settings.desc: Display the current Frames Per Second of the game.

settings.name: Show Memory
settings.desc: Display the current memory usage of the game.

settings.name: Show Version
settings.desc: Display the current version of the engine.

settings.name: Simplify Info
settings.desc: Simplifies the FPS, Memory and Version display.

settings.name: Note Skin
settings.desc: Adjust the skin your notes use.

settings.name: Icon Style
settings.desc: Changes how the health bar icons bop to the beat.

settings.name: Rating Camera
settings.desc: Changes what camera the judgements (rating and combo) are placed on.
